results.title: Studying the Effect of Taking Statins before Infection in the Severity Reduction of COVID-19 with Machine Learning
results.text_hl: In conclusion, we can estimate the positive influence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ on @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ severity for people that take @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ before @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@ to the @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ virus.

results.title: Simvastatin-hydroxyapatite coatings prevent biofilm formation and improve bone formation in implant-associated infections
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@-@CHEMICAL_Durapatite @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017886 @@@hydroxyapatite@@@ coatings prevent biofilm formation and improve bone formation in implant-associated @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infections@@@

results.title: Simvastatin enhanced antimicrobial effect of Ag+ against E. faecalis infection of dentine through PLGA co-delivery submicron particles.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ enhanced antimicrobial effect of Ag+ against @SPECIES_1351 @@@E. faecalis@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection of@@@ dentine through @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@ co-delivery submicron particles.

results.title: Repurposing simvastatin for treatment of Klebsiella pneumoniae infections: in vitro and in vivo study.
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ has significantly improved the survival of @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and decreased the burden of @DISEASE_Mysophobia @DISEASE_MESH:C000719206 @@@bacteria@@@ in the @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infected@@@ lungs.

results.title: A High-Fat Diet Exacerbates the Course of Experimental Trypanosoma cruzi Infection That Can Be Mitigated by Treatment with Simvastatin
results.text_hl: When the animals were fed the high-fat diet, the @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@ also increased the body mass, and the same occurred in the @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infected@@@ animals treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin Administration Prohibits Staphylococcus aureus Anti-ROS Adaptation In Vivo and Alleviates Bone Infections.
results.text_hl: A @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@ model demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can reduce bacterial loads, alleviate @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@ outcomes, and increase the cure rate of @CHEMICAL_Vancomycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014640 @@@vancomycin@@@ in treating @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone infections@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen G, Fan Z, Jia M, Li R, He Y, Lin X, Teng H. Simvastatin Administration Prohibits Staphylococcus aureus Anti-ROS Adaptation In Vivo and Alleviates Bone Infections. ACS Infect Dis. 2025 Jul 31;():. PMID: 40742375

results.text_hl: SIM-DOX and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ nanospheres could be considered to promote the repair of infected periodontal sites and non-@<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infected osseous defects@@@ respectively.

results.title: Design and in vitro/in vivo evaluations of a multiple-drug-containing gingiva disc for periodontotherapy
results.text_hl: In the current work, we set out to develop and evaluate a gingiva disc of @CHEMICAL_cellulose_acetate_phthalate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C011708 @@@cellulose acetate phthalate@@@ and poloxamer F-127 for the simultaneous delivery of multiple drugs, namely @CHEMICAL_Minocycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008911 @@@minocycline@@@, @CHEMICAL_Celecoxib @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068579 @@@celecoxib@@@, @CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@doxycycline hyclate@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, to abolish @<m>DISEASE_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007239 @@@infection@@@, impede @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, avert @DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis_Biliary @DISEASE_MESH:D008105 @@@collagen destruction@@@, and promote alveolar bone regeneration, respectively.

citations.NLM: Jain P, Mirza MA, Talegaonkar S, Nandy S, Dudeja M, Sharma N, Anwer MK, Alshahrani SM, Iqbal Z. Design and in vitro/in vivo evaluations of a multiple-drug-containing gingiva disc for periodontotherapy  RSC Adv. 2020 Feb 24;10(14):8530-8538. PMID: 35497829
